Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service and regional state park police
Summary: Relates to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service, regional state park police and investigators for the office of the attorney general.
LawCode: Amd ยง384-e, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing certain persons in an optional twenty year retirement plan for state university police officer service, regional state park police and investigators for the office of the attorney general
